title: Megan McKenna's ex-boyfriend Jordan Davies calls her 'fake' and makes fun of her lips
text:

Megan McKenna is flying high on Celebrity X Factor, and it seems like one of her exes is pretty bitter about it.

Jordan Davies, who she dated from 2016 to 2017, brands her "fake" and pokes fun at her lip fillers in tonight's episode of Comedy Central's Your Face Or Mine.

On the show, Jordan has to decide who is better looking out of his exes and his current girlfriend Isobel Mills - who awkwardly sits next to him while he does it.

The 27-year-old chooses Isobel, claiming that she is more natural than the former TOWIE star, also 27.

(Image: Comedy Central)

(Image: Instagram/megan_mckenna)

Hosts Katherine Ryan and Jimmy Carr bring up Megan's picture on the screen and ask him to choose.

Isobel said Megan was better looking but Jordan disagrees, saying: "No, I’d say you because she's so fake!"

The audience gasps and Jordan is forced to defend himself, adding: "Those lips aren't real, do you know I mean? They've been filled in."

"I don't agree," Isobel says.

(Image: MTV)

Jordan argues: "It's not gonna be Megan, you underrate yourself."

The audience votes that Megan was better looking out of the two girls.

The former couple got together after meeting on MTV show Ex On The Beach, and returned to a later series, where he popped the question.

She later said she was angry that Jordan had proposed on camera, telling the Daily Mail : "I wish he didn't do it, I think it's embarrassing. He embarrassed me.

(Image: ITV)

"He lied to me about the ring price for a start... He makes me out to be bad all the time but he needs to realise he's a liar.

"I actually blocked Jordan on everything when we broke up because he wasn't a very good boy.

"I think he's been a little s**tbag really and he tries to get back to me with other people and it doesn't work. Let him get on with it because I'm happy."

Your Face Or Mine continues tonight at 8pm on Comedy Central UK
description: Jordan Davies said his new girlfriend Isobel Mills is better looking than Megan because she doesn't have fake lips
